about_the_game:
Synopsis

In a village known as Cloud Whale Town, a writer named Sen Hai took a train to Cloud Whale Town to recuperate, and met the incredible girl Ling in the town, who claimed that Sen Hai had a book in his hand that could predict the future, and asked Sen Hai to take him home according to the book's guidance.

Description of the game

"The Other Side of the Sky" is the first work of the Pygma Society, and the game genre is text adventure, which incorporates neta stalks to add interest, and this story is a single-line plot with a text volume of about 60,000 words. The background image is made from commercially available photo footage.
The official number of the game is b, station PYGMA society, qq group 993644086 welcome to play.

Development Member

Producer & Screenplay: Chenhuo
Art: Meow Meow (cover), Shusuke (vertical painting), No. 2 machine (CG maid), Yunyu (CG sleeping), Tatsuhuo (CG beach), Black Tea Rabbit (Q version CG)
Music & Director's Direction: Unit 2
Performance: Lonely Falls in Love with the Night
Program &UI: Lonely fell in love with the night
Voiced by: Yun Sheng s
Cooperation: aurora, DeaKoontz, Mian, Ko'an, Lexington, Turman pig

Public Material Sources & Acknowledgments

UI material: BOOTH fantasy curve
Music: DOVA-SYNDROME
Sound & Background Image: PIXABAY, Pexels

  • Processor: 1000MHz

  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

short_description: "The Other Side of the Sky" is a short text adventure game with an alternate fantasy setting in a single-line ending narrative mode.
